name: 陳昭伶
objective: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Using the multimedia features of films, this course will help students strengthen their listening skills. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.
